Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Specifies the maximum number of content items allowed in the configured “Content folder”. If not set, the number is not limited.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The delay time between generating new sessions (in milliseconds).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The maximum number of sessions that wait for creation. If more session requests are present at the same time, they are ignored.
